sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for evaluating motor coordination using the Rota Rod apparatus.
sections.scope: Applicable to pharmacological experiments conducted in the Pharmacology laboratory.
procedure: Ensure the apparatus is clean and properly installed.
Switch ON the Rota Rod apparatus.
Place the animal gently on the rotating rod.
Start the timer and observe the fall-off time.
Record the time taken for the animal to fall.
After completion, switch OFF the apparatus.
sections.precautions: Handle animals gently. Do not expose animals to unnecessary stress.
